entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
